generatedPrompts.backCover: A minimalist and artistic design that subtly concludes the card's humorous narrative. In the center-left, a single, elegant golden ribbon from the gift box on the front cover is depicted, now untied and gracefully spiraling downwards. A few tiny, sparkling motes of the 'priceless presence' aura from the front cover float gently around the ribbon. The background is the same soft, warm pastel as the front cover, creating a serene and peaceful atmosphere. The design is simple, elegant, and positioned away from the bottom-right corner, which is left intentionally blank. Flat 2D art style.
generatedPrompts.frontCover: A humorous and artistic transformation scene in a flat 2D cartoon style. On the left, a charming cartoon character of Jordan, with a witty smile, stands next to a large, beautifully wrapped gift box topped with a huge, perfect bow. The box is comically oversized. On the right, the scene transforms: the gift box has vanished, and Jordan is now striking a triumphant, heroic pose, chest puffed out, with a golden, sparkly aura radiating from him. A whimsical spotlight from above shines down on him. The background is a soft, warm pastel color, maintaining a lighthearted feel. In the center, the text "Happy Birthday" is written in a beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script. The art style is clean and modern, with a consistent color palette of warm pastels, gold, and soft blues. The characters are stylized and friendly, inspired by the reference image but as charming cartoons.
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: An artistic and humorous diagram in a flat 2D style, resembling a page from a vintage scientific journal but with a playful, modern twist. The diagram, titled "The Pricelessness Equation" in elegant script, visually breaks down the concept of Jordan's presence. It features whimsical charts and graphs: a bar graph where 'My Presence' is an infinitely tall, sparkling golden bar next to tiny bars for 'Diamonds' and 'Pizza'; a pie chart that is 100% 'Awesome'; and a funny, complex-looking formula (like E=mc-squared) that equates Jordan's presence to infinite joy. The illustrations are done with clean lines and the same warm pastel and gold color palette as the rest of the card, making it look both smart and funny.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior: A beautiful and funny illustration framing the handwritten message. A giant, delicious-looking slice of cartoon pizza, styled with artistic flair, dominates the top of the design. Its melted cheese gracefully drips down the left side, forming an elegant, decorative border around the central message area. Tiny, shimmering golden hearts are embedded in the cheese drips, subtly connecting to the 'priceless presence' theme. The message is written in the center in a beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script with a natural pen-style appearance: "Happy Birthday, Lao Lao! I was going to get you a ridiculously expensive gift, but then I remembered my presence is priceless. You're welcome! I love you more than pizza, and that's saying a lot. Love, Jordan". The background is a soft, complementary pastel, ensuring the text is perfectly legible within this unique, food-themed frame.
